name: Ashland Global Holdings Inc.
description: Ashland Global Holdings Inc. is a premier specialty chemicals company dedicated to providing innovative solutions and high-performance products across a variety of industries. Established in 1924, Ashland has evolved to meet the ever-changing demands of its global customer base. The company operates through three primary segments: Specialty Ingredients, Performance Materials, and Water Technologies. Ashland’s Specialty Ingredients segment offers a broad range of products including polymers, additives, and emulsions, catering to markets such as personal care, pharmaceuticals, and food. The Performance Materials segment focuses on producing resins and adhesives for diverse applications, including construction and automotive. Meanwhile, the Water Technologies segment provides advanced solutions for water treatment, helping industries manage water resources effectively. With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, Ashland emphasizes responsible manufacturing practices and the development of eco-friendly products. The company continues to invest in research and development to ensure that it meets the evolving needs of its customers while contributing positively to the environment. Ashland’s mission is to enhance the quality of life for its customers by delivering essential products that improve performance, safety, and sustainability in their applications.

faq.answer: Ashland is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, USA.
